conclusion: Understanding how shadows change when the light source moves.
Identify the objects in the image: a baseball, an egg, an apple, and a microphone.
The light source is positioned above these objects.
The shadow of the baseball will change due to the light source's movement.
The shadow of the egg and apple will remain the same because they are not affected by the light source's position.
As the light source moves to the right, the shadow of the baseball will shift accordingly.
The shadow of the baseball will move to the right of its original position.
The size of the shadow will remain the same as it is determined by the light source's position relative to the objects.
The shadow of the baseball will move to the right, but its size will remain the same.
The shadow of the baseball will move to the right.
